page.title: SEC Makes Krispy Kreme Probe Formal
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. securities regulators have ratcheted up their probe of Krispy Kreme Doughnuts Inc.'s <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=KKD.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">KKD.N</A> franchise buybacks, the company said on Friday, triggering a sharp drop in its stock.
